dc_description_s: This line shapefile contains the limit lines for territorial land claims made on the continent of Antarctica. These data are represented at 1:10,000,000 scale. This layer is part of the Natural Earth Collection (v.2.0.0). Natural Earth is a public domain map dataset available at 1:10, 1:50 and 1:110 million scales. Featuring tightly integrated vector and raster data, with Natural Earth you can make a variety of visually pleasing, well-crafted maps with cartography or GIS software. Kelso, N.V. and Patterson, T. (2012). Antarctic Claim Limit Lines, 1:10 million (2012). Made with Natural Earth, online at http://www.naturalearthdata.com.
